GSD.description:
drm/amd/display: polling vid stream status in hpo dp blank

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.3 by commit 273eaaea321bc8618f07ebbad5a1a50784a31262. For more details please see the references link.
